customTheme.preview: Preview: This is how your custom theme looks!
help.title: Help
help.techStack.title: Technology Stack
help.techStack.description: This application is built using the following technologies:
help.techStack.tauri: Cross-platform framework for building lightweight desktop apps with web technologies.
help.techStack.react: JavaScript library for building user interfaces.
help.techStack.mui: React component library for UI design.
help.techStack.rust: Backend for Tauri, handling system-level operations.
help.errors.title: Common Errors and Solutions
help.errors.popupError.title: Error: 'Failed to open devtools window: popup blocked or other issue'
help.errors.popupError.cause: Browser may block window.open calls as popups.
help.errors.popupError.solution: Ensure your browser allows popups for this app, or use @tauri-apps/plugin-shell to open URLs in the system browser. Add the plugin to Cargo.toml and initialize it in main.rs.
help.errors.minimizeError.title: Error: 'Failed to invoke 'minimize_window' or similar commands'
help.errors.minimizeError.cause: Tauri command not registered or Rust backend issue.
help.errors.minimizeError.solution: Verify that the command (e.g., minimize_window) is included in invoke_handler in main.rs and defined in titlebar_events.rs.
help.errors.devtoolsError.title: Error: 'Devtools opens slowly or not at all'
help.errors.devtoolsError.cause: Network issues or devtools server at 127.0.0.1:3033 not running.
help.errors.devtoolsError.solution: Check if the devtools server is running on 127.0.0.1:3033. Try opening the URL manually in a browser. Ensure your firewall allows connections to this port.
help.errors.themeError.title: Error: 'Theme not switching'
help.errors.themeError.cause: Issue with ThemeContext or incorrect theme application.
help.errors.themeError.solution: Ensure ThemeProviderWrapper wraps the app in the root component and that toggleTheme is correctly updating the theme mode.
help.resources.title: Additional Resources
help.developers.title: For Developers
help.developers.description: This project is a template for building Tauri applications. Below are instructions for extending and customizing it.
help.developers.addPage.title: Adding a New Page
help.developers.addPage.description: To add a new page, create a new React component in src/pages, add it to the routing in src/App.tsx, and update the Sidebar menu.
help.developers.addTranslations.title: Adding Translations
help.developers.addTranslations.descript: Add new translation keys to the translation.json files in public/locales for each supported language.
help.developers.modifyTheme.title: Modifying the Theme
help.developers.modifyTheme.description: Customize the MUI theme by updating the ThemeProviderWrapper in src/ThemeProviderWrapper.tsx.
help.developers.addTauriCommand.title: Adding a Tauri Command
help.developers.addTauriCommand.descript: Add new Tauri commands by defining them in src-tauri/src/main.rs and creating corresponding TypeScript functions in src/utils/tauriCommands.ts.
titlebar.networkDetails.title: Network Status
